title: Echoes of Halden
outcome: Anonymous daily broadcasts of Halden’s logs captivate Stenograd. Each message challenges the city’s ethics and history, sparking public puzzles and mass acts of self-examination. The Council, desperate to reassert control, stokes a citywide competition to decrypt Halden’s final instruction. Neighborhoods rally around new leaders, forging unexpected alliances and open debates over the city’s future. By the end, Halden’s true intentions are revealed—his ‘martyrdom’ was meant to return public voice, not control, to the people.

events.description: Anonymous broadcasts share fragments of Halden's personal logs, each day posing ethical challenges and referencing BCI history.
Council launches a citywide puzzle—decode Halden's 'final instruction.' Neighborhoods compete, interpreting his intent and forming new public forums.
Grassroots leaders argue for dissolving the BCI in favor of open self-governance, using Halden’s words as rallying points. Council resistance weakens as alliances shift.
The puzzle is solved simultaneously by multiple districts. Halden’s final message calls for the permanent return of collective civic voice, shaming silent rule.
Council is forced to cede most decision-making to open neighborhood assemblies, fulfilling Halden’s underlying intent and closing the era of algorithmic dominance.
